com.github.gwtbootstrap.client.ui.base

Interface HasIcon

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Button, IconAnchor, NavbarButton

    public interface HasIcon
    Interface for widgets that have icons.
    Since:
    2.0.2.0
    Author:
    Dominik Mayer

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void setIcon(IconType type)
      Sets the Type of the Icon.
      void setIcon(String iconName)
      Sets the type of the Icon based on the Bootstrap class name.
      void setIconColor(Icon.Color color)
      Sets the color of the icon.
      void setIconColor(String color)
      Sets the color of the icon.

    • Method Detail

      • setIcon

        void setIcon(IconType type)
        Sets the Type of the Icon.
        Parameters:
        type -

      • setIcon

        void setIcon(String iconName)
        Sets the type of the Icon based on the Bootstrap class name.
        Parameters:
        iconName - name of the class to add without the leading "icon-".

      • setIconColor

        void setIconColor(Icon.Color color)
        Sets the color of the icon.

        Default is black.

        Parameters:
        color - the new color.

      • setIconColor

        void setIconColor(String color)
        Sets the color of the icon.
        Parameters:
        color - "black" (default) or "white"
